data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Corgosinho, Paulo H. C., Schizas, Nikolaos V., Previattelli, Daniel, Rocha, Carlos E. Falavigna da, Santos-Silva, Edinaldo Nelson dos (2017): A new genus of Parastenocarididae (Copepoda, Harpacticoida) from the Tocantins River basin (Goias, Brazil), and a phylogenetic analysis of the Parastenocaridinae. Zoosystematics and Evolution 93 (1): 167-187, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.93.11602, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.93.11602
